live_updates: Technical crews are dispatched to arrive on site to investigate this matter. Thank you for your patience.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
45858.summary: Some customers in the Northwood area of Thunder Bay are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
45858.title: Jan 10 – Thunder Bay (Northwood) | All Services - Outage (Fix in Progress)

live_updates: Due to the complexity of this outage, our technicians are still working to resolve. Thank you for your patience.

Technicians continue to work to restore service as quickly possible. However, due to the nature of the repairs involved, we expect that this will take several hours. We will continue to monitor the situation and provide updates when available.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
45850.title: Jan 10 - Calgary (Temple) | Service Interruption (Fix in Progress)
